predicate.note: Frames file for 'tramp' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 51.3.2, Framenet entry Self motion.

example.name: the one example
example.text: ``I 've ripped out a lot of Delicious'' and grafted the trees with many different shoots, says Steve Wood, a West Lebanon, N.H., grower, [*-2] tramping through his 100-acre Poverty Lane Orchard on a crisp autumn day recently.
example.arg: [*-2] -> Steve Wood , a West Lebanon , N.H. , grower
